Topic.Title: Coca Cola to $50/- by the end of year :

Message.Msg: I am a long time holder of KO, and would love to see it at 50. I also hold F and would love if some people's predictions of 30 for it at the end of the year were true. Same with FCX at 45 and GE at 30. Point is, it is nice to dream, but realistically it likely won't happen.

Message.Title: Credit Suisse initiates coverage on Coca-Cola (KO) with an Outperform rating.
Message.Msg: Wednesday, June 19, 7:00 AM ET Credit Suisse initiates coverage on Coca-Cola (KO) with an Outperform rating.

Message.Title: Do some DD on PSID. Looks ready to run.
Message.Msg: Do some DD on PSID. Seems like it is ready to take off

Topic.Title: Coca Cola to $50/- by the end of year :

Message.Title: Beverage companies drop on Bernanke comments?
Message.Msg: If you look at the time, KO begins its descent at about 2:30 where the confusion begins. KO had a really nice little pop all day till, boom. All beverage companies did. People don't stop drinking Coke when the gov stops buying. And when the economy is bad there is nothing like a Coke to hold the booze. I know the market is nuts but come on. On the short term tech KO is coming out of a healthy MACD dip with other indicators suggesting a buy opportunity. If it ended unchanged, oh well it followed the market. But -.52 ??? Just Nuts.
